snippet.title: The Thing: Remastered - Available NOW | Nightdive Studios
snippet.description:
During the PC Gaming Show on December 5, we shared a brand new trailer for The Thing: Remastered along with the exciting news that the game is available TODAY for Xbox One, Series X|S, PS4, PS5, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam, GOG, Humble)! 

===================================
The Thing: Remastered - AVAILABLE NOW
===================================
🟢 Xbox: https://bit.ly/3YdmReM
🔵 PlayStation: https://bit.ly/48hQKz5
🔴 Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/4f8f4oO
🟡 Steam: https://bit.ly/48fvVnO
🟣 GOG: https://bit.ly/3NB2nI0
🟠 Humble: https://bit.ly/3NAp3If
===========================
Connect With Us!   
=============================
IG ➡️ http://www.instagram.com/nightdivestudios
Twitch ➡️ http://www.twitch.tv/nightdivestudios
Tik Tok ➡️ https://www.tiktok.com/@nightdive.studios
Discord ➡️ https://discord.com/invite/nightdivestudios
Facebook ➡️ http://www.facebook.com/NightDiveStudios/
X | Twitter ➡️ https://x.com/NightdiveStudio
=============================
#nightdive #thething #universal #atari #pcgamingshow
